item.title: ainsuasty.com
item.description: My own web page ainsuasty.com üë®‚Äçüíº I started building my webpage on 2020. All source code is on github ainsuasty.com. The template hugo-coder was chosen from Hugo. A forked version is on my github where I changed the family-font from fonts.google.com. This forked version is a submodule of the ainsuasty.com repository. A good guideline to create smart websites is the book written by Yihui Xie blogdown. ainsuasty.com contains:
